topic: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary

ideas.title: Commentary Crisis
ideas.premise: A commentator in a Channel 7 studio yells 'Carn the Aussies!' repeatedly, only to be subtly corrected on air that they're commentating for an *international* audience.
ideas.why_funny: Satirizes nationalistic commentary and awkward broadcasting moments.

ideas.title: Melbourne's Weather Watch
ideas.premise: A panel of meteorologists desperately try to predict the Gold Coast weather for the T20 game, despite only having Melbourne weather data.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at the irrelevance of Melbourne's weather to the Gold Coast.

ideas.title: Fairport Convention Cricket
ideas.premise: The aforementioned bassist, now umpiring, smashes a batsman over the head with his bass after a contentious LBW decision.
ideas.why_funny: Combines the cricket with the bizarre bassist news story.

ideas.title: Yarra River Paddle
ideas.premise: Two Indian cricket fans are paddling down the Yarra River on a giant inflatable cricket ball, desperately trying to reach Hobart in time for the game.
ideas.why_funny: Uses a Melbourne landmark and exaggerates fan dedication.

ideas.title: Kookaburra Commentary
ideas.premise: A Kookaburra perches on the commentator's microphone and makes a perfectly timed, cricket-related cackle after every Indian wicket falls.
ideas.why_funny: Australian native animal interjects with perfectly topical noises.
